etymology.interpretation: Combines two near-synonyms to emphasize giving assistance or support; used as both a verb and a noun. Slightly more formal than simply using 帮/幫 alone.
etymology.simplification: 幫 was simplified to 帮 by reducing strokes and merging components to a simpler form; 助 remained unchanged.

examples.chinese: 我可以帮助你(我可以幫助你)。
谢谢你的帮助(謝謝你的幫助)。
如果你需要帮助(如果你需要幫助)，就告诉我(就告訴我)。
examples.pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ xūyào bāngzhù, jiù gàosu wǒ.
examples.english: If you need help, just tell me.
